title: HDFC Bank to assign Rs 9,062 crore car loan pool to mutual funds to correct its credit-deposit ratio
description: PTCs are issued across three tranches- with series A1 having an issue size of Rs 3,500 crore and maturing in 24 months, series A2 of Rs 1,800 crore and maturing in 34 months and series A3 of Rs 3762 crore for 60 months.
